data.persona: I am cold blooded and crawl around through the rocks. I lay eggs in the soil or under rocks. I am small compared to the fierce dragon and children like to catch me for fun.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrifice Chamber.
Bones of the damned riddle the floor and every surface inside the room. Blood stains are rampant on table like surface, surfaces once used for human sacrifices. A foul, but faint, odor pervades even the most hardiest of nostrils.
There's a stone, a table, a bone, a temple, a map, a sword, and a religious text here.
The swimmer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to distract the swimmer.
data.mid_motivation: I want to eat the swimmer and add his bones to my collection.
data.long_motivation: I want to lure more swimmers into the sacrifice chamber to feed my lizard family.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go the sacrifice chamber to wait for a swimmer to arrive.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: drink water from the dripping drains hugging the walls of the sacrifice chamber.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the stone and hide behind it as the swimmer arrives.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the bone and throw it across the room with my mouth to distract the swimmer.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the swimmer and bite his jugular causing him to bleed to death.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat the swimmer and wait for more of his kind to arrive.
